html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-00412023-02-02,  ,  GAC,  ,  , 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add thirty-eight (38) individuals and sixteen (16) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; and (2) include a new exception for the price cap on petroleum products loaded onto a vessel at the port of loading prior to February 5, 2023 and unloaded at the port of destination prior to April 1, 2023.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0014 Publication Date: 2023-02-15
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add thirty-eight (38) individuals and sixteen (16) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; and (2) include a new exception for the price cap on petroleum products loaded onto a vessel at the port of loading prior to February 5, 2023 and unloaded at the port of destination prior to April 1, 2023.
